name: My Best Friend Bucky
description:
Your friend is always with you!
Take care of Bucky the little Be-Be-Bear - tend to him, make sure he stays healthy, entertain him, dress him up, go on adventures together, and discover an amazing world!

TAKE CARE OF LITTLE BUCKY
Make sure Bucky the little Be-Be-Bear stays healthy so he can grow up big and strong! Feed him, put him to bed on time, keep him clean, and don’t forget to have fun together.

DECORATE BUCKY’S HOME
Make Bucky’s home even cozier! The older the bear gets, the more you’ll want to make his home beautiful and get new items for it.

CHOOSE OUTFITS
Create a one-of-a-kind style so your Be-Be-Bear can become a truly special teddy! Bucky’s closet is full of unique outfits to satisfy any taste, so get creative!

HAVE FUN AND LEARN ABOUT THE WORLD WITH BUCKY
Everyone likes to play and have fun, and doing it with Bucky is even better! There are lots of fun mini-games in the app, so you’ll never get bored!

HOW DO YOU PLAY?
As you take care of Bucky and complete levels you collect beautiful stickers and phtotographs in a special album and earn experience and in-game currency you can use to buy even more outfits and decorations for your home. The better you take care of your Be-Be-Bear, the more new things you can do in the game! Be a nice, attentive friend so you can have fun with Bucky and watch him grow up!

Follow our updates on social media:
https://www.facebook.com/interactive.mult/

PLEASE NOTE: This app is not supported on iPhone 4s, iPad Mini, and devices from earlier generations.
